text: aur unaka bhee hissa hai aur jo log un (mohaajereen) ke baad aae (aur) dua karate hain ki paravaradigaara hamaaree aur un logon kee jo hamase pahale eemaan la chuke magapherat kar aur mominon kee taraph se hamaare dilon mein kisee tarah ka keena na aane de paravaradigaar beshak too bada shapheeq nihaayat raham vaala hai
